bug.author: marcgpuig
bug.summary: Possible memory leak in Windows Release
bug.description:
Tested in version 0.7.1, after a couple of hours, the server crashes. The log file says that unreal is trying to allocate more and more memory for each resset. Log start and end: <denchmark-code>[ 0]Requested Allocations: 30.623291mb (including block size padding) ... [751]Requested Allocations: 12592.825348mb (including block size padding) </denchmark-code>
12 gb is too much.

comments.comment: It has not happened again ðŸ™ˆ
